# Test vectors for RoutingControl ports
# 0 means force 0
# 1 means force 1
# L means expect 0
# H means expect 1
# X means donâ€™t care
########################
## Clock cycle = 10ns ##
########################
#time OutputPort    SelectedPort   ConnectionsResets
0     000           111            11111          
5     000           111            00000       
10    000           111            00000       
15    000           111            00000       
# First Port (0) packet is coming => Address=1:1
20    000           111            00000       
25    000           000            00000       
# Second Port (1) packet is coming => Address=2:2
30    000           111            00000       
35    000           111            00001       
40    000           001            00000       
45    000           111            00000       
50    000           111            00000       
# Third Port (2) packet is coming => Address=3:3
55    000           111            00001       
60    000           010            00000       
65    000           111            00001     
70    000           011            00000       
75    000           011            00000       
80    000           011            00000       
85    000           011            00000       
90    000           011            00000       
95    000           011            00000       
100   000           011            00000

120   000           011            00000       
125   000           011            00000       
130   000           011            00000       
135   000           011            00000

145   000           101            00000
